info.title: Instagram_Info
info.description: Retrieve detailed information about an Instagram account, including contacts and account details.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about an Instagram account, including contacts and account details.

about.description: Information about the account, including country and date_joined.

account_badges.description: List of badges associated with the account.

account_type.description: Type of the account (e.g., personal, business).

active_standalone_fundraisers.description: All the currently active fundraisers associated with the account.

ads_page_id.description: ID of the ads page associated with the account.

ads_page_name.description: Name of the ads page associated with the account.

bio_links.description: Links in the biography of the account.

biography_email.description: Email address mentioned in the biography, if any.

biography_with_entities.description: Entities mentioned in the biography if any.

business_contact_method.description: Preferred method of contact for business inquiries.

can_add_fb_group_link_on_profile.description: Boolean indicating if a Facebook group link can be added to the profile.

can_hide_category.description: Boolean indicating if the account category can be hidden.

can_hide_public_contacts.description: Boolean indicating if public contact information can be hidden.

category.description: Category of the account (e.g., Public figure, Blogger).

contact_phone_number.description: Contact phone number associated with the account.

current_catalog_id.description: ID of the current catalog associated with the account.

direct_messaging.description: Direct messaging capabilities of the account.

external_lynx_url.description: External URL linked to the account with tracking parameters.

external_url.description: External URL linked to the account.

fbid_v2.description: Facebook ID version 2 associated with the account.

follower_count.description: Number of followers of the account.

following_count.description: Number of accounts the user is following.

full_name.description: Full name of the account holder.

has_anonymous_profile_picture.description: Boolean indicating if the profile picture is anonymous.

has_chaining.description: Boolean indicating if the account has chaining enabled.

has_guides.description: Boolean indicating if the account has guides enabled.

has_igtv_series.description: Boolean indicating if the account has IGTV series.

is_business.description: Boolean indicating if the account is a business account.

is_call_to_action_enabled.description: Boolean indicating if call-to-action is enabled for the account.

is_category_tappable.description: Boolean indicating if the category is tappable.

is_eligible_for_request_message.description: Boolean indicating if the account is eligible for request messages.

is_favorite.description: Boolean indicating if the account is marked as favorite.

is_favorite_for_clips.description: Boolean indicating if the account is marked as favorite for clips.

is_favorite_for_igtv.description: Boolean indicating if the account is marked as favorite for IGTV.

is_favorite_for_stories.description: Boolean indicating if the account is marked as favorite for stories.

is_open_to_collab.description: Boolean indicating if the account is open to collaborations.

is_parenting_account.description: Boolean indicating if the account is a parenting account.

is_private.description: Boolean indicating if the account is private.

is_profile_audio_call_enabled.description: Boolean indicating if audio call is enabled for the profile.

is_verified.description: Boolean indicating if the account is verified.

latest_reel_media.description: ID of the latest reel media posted by the account.

media_count.description: Number of media items posted by the account.

page_id.description: Page ID associated with the account.

page_name.description: Page name associated with the account.

pinned_channels_info.description: Page name associated with the account.

primary_profile_link_type.description: Type of the primary profile link.

professional_conversion_suggested_accoun.description: Suggested account type for professional conversion.

profile_context_facepile_users.description: Users who are part of the profile context facepile.

profile_context_links_with_user_ids.description: Links with user IDs in the profile context.

profile_pic_url_hd.description: HD URL of the profile picture.

public_email.description: Public email associated with the account.

public_phone_country_code.description: Country code of the public phone number.

public_phone_number.description: Public phone number associated with the account.

show_shoppable_feed.description: If the shoppable posts in the feed are show.

third_party_downloads_enabled.description: Boolean indicating if third-party downloads are enabled.

total_igtv_videos.description: Total number of IGTV videos posted by the account.

upcoming_events.description: List of upcoming events associated with the account.

username.description: List of upcoming events associated with the account.
